alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:52AM CDT until April 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MOREHOUSE...SOUTHWESTERN EAST CARROLL... NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 152 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rayville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Rayville around 155 AM CDT. Holly Ridge around 205 AM CDT. Warden around 215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oak Ridge and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
